string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "His grandma was a great piano player."
"He is not into blink-blink."
"He was born on March 1st, 1994."
"His first CD came in November 17th, 2009."
"His favorite slang word is /"Shawty"/."
"He likes a good smile."
"His Dad remarried."
"His most embarrassing moment is when he broke his foot on stage during a song (he stayed and finished the song, didn't even miss a note!)"
"He prefers MACs over PCs."
"His shoe size is 7 and a half."
"He likes captain crunch (with berries)."
"His favorite colors are blue and purple."
"His father's name is Jeremy Bieber."
"Justin Bieber's full name is Justin Drew Bieber."
"He can count to 10 in German."
"His two best friends are Ryan Butler and Chaz Somers."
"He started dating when he was 13."
"He has a half sister named Jazmine & brother Jaxon."
"He can play trumpet, guitar, piano and drums."
"His first kiss was when he was 13."
"He is a lefty."
"His celebrity crush is Beyonce."
"He speaks fluent French."
"He once dated Caitlin Beadles (Christians Beadles sister) ."
"His favorite pie is apple."
"He likes playing soccer."
"His favorite food is spaghetti."
"His favorite TV show is smallville."
"He raised 150,000 lbs of food for food Bank, with the help of his fans."
"His favorite number is 6."
"He is claustrophobic - fear of being in narrow or enclosed spaces (eg. elevators, closet)."
"His mother name is Pattie Mallette."
"He is pals with Taylor Swift."
"His favorite music are R&B and Pop."
"His favorite drink is orange juice."
"His favorite video game is NBA 2k."
"His favorite music artists are: Usher, Michael Jackson, BoysIImen, Stevie Wonder."
"His nicknames are: J-Beebs, Justin, JB, Biebs, Beebs."
"He is very protective for his little sister."
"He likes sporty, active, nice, and down to earth girls."
"He likes to skateboard and is very good at it."
"His dad plays guitar, and his mom sings."
"He likes sour patch kids."
"He is signed by Usher. Justin Timberlake was reportedly in the running to sign Bieber."
"He got his first plaque at YTV's The Next Star at Canadas wonderland."
"He would date anyone he falls in love with."
"He likes vitamin water."
"He wanted to buy a house for his mom when he has $1,000,000."
"He once asked out Rihanna and Alexa Chung (got rejected)."
"He likes tacos."
"He grew up in Canada (Stratford Ontario)"
"He loves his fans!"
"He loves Tim Hortons (very Canadaian)."
"His label is Island def jam."
"Named the hottest star of 2009 by J-14 Magazine"
"Named newcomer of the year by MuchMusic"
"Listed as one of the top 10 YouTube stars of the decade"
"Justin's idol is Wayne Gretzky"
"His favorite number is 96"
"His favorite shoe brand is Supra"
"He is very close to his grandparents. He lived with them"
"It only takes him 20 minutes to get ready in the morning"
"On his first date he spilled sphagetti on his date`s shirt"
"His favorite vacation spot is Bahamas"
"Hes a really good beatboxer"
"His favorite basketball team is Cleveland Cavaliers"
"His favorite song that he wrote is Down To Earth"
"He hates Ugg boots"
"His dog`s name is Sam and is a boy Papillion"
"His favorite soda is Sprite"
"He is homeschooled by tutor"
"Was discovered on YouTube performing on stage"
"He likes Tacos"
"He started drumming at age of 2"
"His family travels with him"
"Justin goes to church and is a Christian."
"Justin found his backup dancers on YouTube."
"Justin has been a victim of cyber bullying."
"Justin's friends reveal he is always pranking people on Chatroullete."
"Justin's dad is the person who taught him how to drive."
"The Today Show was the first place that Justin performed 'Never Say Never' live."
"Justin once held up a sign from his hotel room window saying \"Go to McDonalds and get me a Big Mac\"."
"Sometimes Justin wears a dog tag given to him by a fan. It belonged to a fallen soldier, Justin wears it as a memorial."
"Justin has been best friends with Ryan since they were 7."
"Justin likes bananas and grapes."
"Justin first met Usher in a car park."
